prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Piano, Bass, Strings, Drums, Synth Pad, Reed, Guitar, Organ, but without Chromatic Percussion.
captions:
Style 1:
This composition features Piano, Bass, Strings, Drums, Synth Pad, Reed, Guitar, and Organ, but excludes Chromatic Percussion.

Style 2:
This song is comprised of Piano, Bass, Strings, Drums, Synth Pad, Reed, Guitar, and Organ, omitting Chromatic Percussion.

Style 3:
This piece is made up of Piano, Bass, Strings, Drums, Synth Pad
